meanings.sent1: The lingerer sat on the bench, watching the birds.
meanings.sent2: The park was empty except for the lingerer near the fountain.
meanings.sent3: The lingerer seemed to be waiting for something exciting to happen.
meanings.sent4: She was a lingerer in the world of dreams, never wanting to wake up.
meanings.sent5: The old man was known in the town as the ultimate lingerer, always taking his time.

meanings.definition: One who remains in a place longer than necessary.
meanings.sent1: The office lingerer stayed late every day, even after everyone else had left.
meanings.sent2: The lingerer at the bus stop missed the last bus because they stayed too long.
meanings.sent3: The lingerer at the buffet table was determined to try every dish.
meanings.sent4: She was a lingerer in the realm of memories, reluctant to move on.
meanings.sent5: The lingerer in the library lost track of time among the books.
